page.title: 19Lutton Sunday School.
page.content: Our Sunday School is held in Lutton. It is run by Mrs.D.Baskerville. It starts at half-past ten and finishes at half-past eleven. We learn hymns and songs and we learn about Jesus. Mrs.Baskerville or Angela Stancombe read us stories and then ask us questions about them. In August we have a Sunday School party and we have a disco. We also go on outings in August each year. Sometimes we go to Teignmouth or Paignton or Dawlish. We have our church services in the chapel in Lutton. We are making up our own harvest song using the tune from another hymn. We write stories and draw pictures in groups. Sometimes we go on a walk and collect wild flowers and name them when we get back. Sunday School is fun! Jackie Donald.
